extendedInfo.description: "Can-I-Drive?" for Android is a blood alcohol content (BAC) Calculator, and lets you know its opinion on if you can drive after drinking.  This is also a good way to keep tabs on the designated driver!-Now enter your own custom drinks with the new Detailed Entry including the following details:     -Alcohol Percentage     -Amount of Alcohol in drink     -Drink Name-Share your blood alcohol content with your friends with the new Share feature.-Try the refined Find A Taxi feature if you need a ride.  This feature does a Google search for taxis based on your current location.Right now Can-I-Drive? assumes a legal driving limit of .08**1 drink = one 12 ounce light beer, one 80 proof shot of liquor, or one 8 ounce glass of wine.Of course the best choice is to not drink any alcohol if you will be driving.  If you have been drinking you can call a taxi or a friend to drive you home.Please email or tweet (@jakewp11) me with any bugs that you run into.Jakewp11 is not responsible for the users decision to drive. BAC can fluctuate based on many other factors such as genetics and food consumption.  Can-I-Drive? does not calculate your exact BAC, but it is a very close estimate. This is an entertainment app and a calculator based on a formula, not a breathalyzer replacement.Follow me on Twitter (@jakewp11) or Facebook (facebook.com/JWPapps) for up-to-date information on all of my apps.Keywords: Can I Drive, Can, I, Drive, BAC, Calculator, drunk, drink, sober, soberapp, designated, driver, driving, beer

reviews.title: Very good
